sentences.en: " Digital communication by definition has higher fidelity, " Mr. Neuman said.
sentences.cn: “ 数字通信由于清晰而具有较高的保真度, ” 纽曼先生说.

sentences.en: And so she did with the fidelity of a little child.
sentences.cn: 因此她就照着做了,简直象小孩子一样听话.

sentences.en: He appreciated his discretion and his fidelity.
sentences.cn: 他欣赏他的谨慎和忠诚。

sentences.en: He knew the simple single - hearted fidelity of his child, and understood why she had come.
sentences.cn: 他十分了解他这个单纯朴实的孩子的孝心, 了解她是为什么来的.

sentences.en: Her mood of ecstatic fidelity was a dangerous exaltation.
sentences.cn: 她苦行主义的忠实气质是一种危险的升华.

sentences.en: His fidelity and industry brought him speedy promotion.
sentences.cn: 他的尽职及勤奋使他很快地得到晋升.

sentences.en: I had to promise fidelity to the Queen.
Low - fidelity prototypes omit details, use cheaper materials, or use different interaction techniques.
sentences.cn: 低精度的原型忽略了细节, 使用低成本的材料, 或者使用不同的交互技术.

sentences.en: Natural style , however, should not be conquered at the expense of fidelity.
sentences.cn: 自然流畅的文风, 不应该以牺牲忠实为代价.

sentences.en: The artist had caught, with remarkable fidelity, Ruth's graceful beauty and serenity.
sentences.cn: 艺术家以惊人的精确性抓住了露丝优雅的面貌与安详的神态.

sentences.en: The resolution of an etching process is a measure of the fidelity of pattern transfer.
sentences.cn: 刻蚀工艺的分辨率是图形转移保真度的量度.

sentences.en: Wanting fidelity implies you're thinking about a major relationship.
sentences.cn: 要求忠诚意味着你想发展一段严肃认真的恋爱关系。

sentences.en: You have invariably been models of courage and fidelity.
sentences.cn: 你们始终是勇敢与忠诚的模范.

phrases.tran_cn: 声音保真度；声音逼真度

trans.tran_cn: 忠诚，忠实，逼真，保真度，尽责
trans.tran_en: when you are loyal to your husband, girlfriend etc, by not having sex with anyone else
